step.datasource: UPDATE [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_SS_WO_Attachments] SET ABEI_status = 1 from [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_SS_WO_Attachments] sa inner join [orlaco].[dbo].[absences] a on a.hid = sa.hid where sa.hid > 1000000 and ABEI_status = 0 AND SynergyId IS NULL

select a.id as DocumentId ,(CASE WHEN WOSurveyID IS NULL THEN 'Werkbon_' + CONVERT(varchar,WOID) ELSE 'Eigen_formulier_' + CONVERT(varchar,WOSurveyId) END) + '.pdf' as BinaryFilename ,MAX(sa.[File]) as BinaryAttachment ,4 as EntityType from [exactdata]..[_ST_SS_WO_Attachments] sa inner join [orlaco].[dbo].[Absences] a on a.hid = sa.hid where abei_status = 1 AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT ba.ID FROM [orlaco]..attachments ba where ba.EntityType = 4 and ba.AttachmentFileExtension = 'pdf' and Entity = a.id and AttachmentFileName = (CASE WHEN WOSurveyID IS NULL THEN 'Werkbon_' + CONVERT(varchar,WOID) ELSE 'Eigen_formulier_' + CONVERT(varchar,WOSurveyId) END) + '.pdf') GROUP BY a.id, WOId, WOSurveyId

select 'Werkbon_' + CONVERT(varchar,WOID) AS Subject ,'Werkbon_' + CONVERT(varchar,WOID) + '.pdf' AS BinaryFilename ,'Simple Simon Werkbon ' + CONVERT(varchar,WOID) AS Note ,24 AS Type ,'I' AS Source ,MAX(sa.[File]) AS BinaryDocument ,o.ordernr AS OrderNumber ,o.ordernr AS ProjectNr ,a.hid as OurRef ,c.cmp_wwn AS CMPWWN from [exactdata]..[_ST_SS_WO_Attachments] sa inner join [orlaco].[dbo].[Absences] a WITH (NOLOCK) on a.hid = sa.hid and a.type IN (630,600) inner join [400].[dbo].[orkrg] o WITH (NOLOCK) on o.ordernr = (CASE WHEN a.type = 630 THEN a.FreeTextField_09 ELSE CASE WHEN a.type = 600 THEN a.FreeTextField_11 END END ) inner join [400].[dbo].[cicmpy] c WITH (NOLOCK) on o.debnr = c.debnr where abei_status = 1 AND WOSurveyID IS NULL AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT ba.ID FROM [400]..bacodiscussions ba where ba.OrderNumber = o.ordernr AND Filename = 'Werkbon_' + CONVERT(varchar,WOID) + '.pdf') GROUP BY WOID, o.ordernr, a.hid, c.cmp_wwn

UPDATE [exactdata]..[_ST_SS_WO_Attachments] SET ABEI_status = 2, SynergyID = ba.ID from [exactdata]..[_ST_SS_WO_Attachments] sa inner join [orlaco].[dbo].[Absences] ad on ad.hid = sa.hid inner join [orlaco]..attachments ba on ba.EntityType = 4 and ba.Entity = ad.id AND ba.AttachmentFileExtension = 'pdf' and AttachmentFileName = (CASE WHEN WOSurveyID IS NULL THEN 'Werkbon_' + CONVERT(varchar,WOID) ELSE 'Eigen_formulier_' + CONVERT(varchar,WOSurveyId) END) + '.pdf' WHERE ABEI_status = 1 and SynergyID IS NULL

UPDATE [exactdata]..[_ST_SS_WO_Attachments] SET ABEI_status = 3 from [exactdata]..[_ST_SS_WO_Attachments] sa inner join [orlaco].[dbo].[Absences] ad on ad.hid = sa.hid WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT ba.ID FROM [orlaco]..attachments ba where ba.EntityType = 4 and ba.AttachmentFileExtension = 'pdf' and Entity = ad.id and AttachmentFileName = (CASE WHEN WOSurveyID IS NULL THEN 'Werkbon_' + CONVERT(varchar,WOID) ELSE 'Eigen_formulier_' + CONVERT(varchar,WOSurveyId) END) + '.pdf' ) AND ABEI_status = 1
UPDATE [exactdata]..[_ST_SS_WO_Attachments] SET ABEI_status = 4 from [exactdata]..[_ST_SS_WO_Attachments] sa WHERE ABEI_status = 0
step.stepname: Attachments Set Status 4 for not found

step.datasource: UPDATE [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_SS_WO_Planning] SET abei_status = 1 from [orlaco].[dbo].[absences] a inner join (SELECT sa.hid, max(sa.id) as id from [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_SS_WO_Planning] sa where sa.hid > 1000000 and sa.abei_status = 0 group by sa.hid) sa1 on a.hid = sa1.hid inner join [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_SS_WO_Planning] sa2 on sa1.id = sa2.id WHERE a.type in (600, 630) and a.status in (0,1)

select a.id, h.res_id as EmpID, sa2.PlannedStart as StartDate, sa2.PlannedEnd as EndDate from [orlaco].[dbo].[absences] a inner join (SELECT sa.hid, max(sa.id) as id from [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_SS_WO_Planning] sa where sa.hid > 1000000 and sa.abei_status = 1 group by sa.hid) sa1 on a.hid = sa1.hid inner join [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_SS_WO_Planning] sa2 on sa1.id = sa2.id LEFT join [orlaco].dbo.humres h on h.res_id = CASE WHEN sa2.EmployeeID in ( 1, 999 ) THEN 400 ELSE sa2.EmployeeID END WHERE a.type in (600, 630) and a.status in (0,1) AND (sa2.EmployeeID <> EmpID OR sa2.PlannedStart <> StartDate OR sa2.PlannedEnd <> EndDate) AND ( h.ldatuitdienst IS NULL or h.ldatuitdienst > GETDATE()) group by a.id, a.HID, a.type, a.Status, h.res_id, a.StartDate, a.EndDate, sa2.EmployeeID, sa2.PlannedStart, sa2.PlannedEnd
UPDATE [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_SS_WO_Planning] SET ABEI_status = 2 from [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_SS_WO_Planning] sa inner join [orlaco].[dbo].[absences] a on a.hid = sa.hid where ABEI_status = 1

step.stepname: Planning Set Status 3 for unchanged plans

step.datasource:
select a.ID, a.entity, b.hid, a.AttachmentFileName from [orlaco]..attachments a inner join [orlaco]..Absences b on a.EntityType = 4 and a.Entity = b.id inner join (SELECT DISTINCT HID FROM [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_SS_WO_Attachments] ) c on c.hid = b.hid where (AttachmentFileName like 'Eigen_formulier_%.pdf' or AttachmentFileName like 'Werkbon_%.pdf') AND a.id not in (
select MIN(a.ID) from [orlaco]..attachments a inner join [orlaco]..Absences b on a.EntityType = 4 and a.Entity = b.id inner join (SELECT DISTINCT HID FROM [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_SS_WO_Attachments] ) c on c.hid = b.hid where AttachmentFileName like 'Eigen_formulier_%.pdf' or AttachmentFileName like 'Werkbon_%.pdf' group by a.entity, b.hid, a.AttachmentFileName )
